output_list.reason: The 'distribute' function allows users to mint tokens in an integer overflow attack, where the totalAmount variable can be set to a very large value, allowing users to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.
The 'batchTransfer' function allows users to mint tokens in a batch, where the function only checks the length of the receivers and the value, allowing users to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.

The 'mintToken' function allows the owner to mint tokens in an integer overflow attack, where the totalSupply variable can be set to a very large value, allowing users to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.

The 'claimThrone' function allows users to mint tokens in an integer overflow attack, where the balance variable can be set to a very large value, allowing users to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.
The 'ToOwner' function allows any user to claim ownership and funds, where the owner can be set to any user, allowing unauthorized access to the contract.
